docs.title: Welcome
docs.text: Welcome to my website. I'm Aniket Tekawade, a systems engineer, researcher, and writer. This site hosts my essays, notes, and project ideas.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text:
You can reach me via:

  • LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/anikettekawade
  • GitHub: github.com/anikettekawade

docs.title: Essays
docs.text: This section will feature long-form essays on topics related to science, engineering, and creative exploration.

docs.title: Scratchpad
docs.text: Quick thoughts, technical notes, and unfinished explorations.
